items.description: Built AI chatbot enabling customers to self-serve ledger categorization. Achieved 50% customer engagement and 98% accuracy on categorized transactions.
Automated ledger categorization of 30% of remaining monthly uncategorized transactions by deploying per-client ML models.
Earned Bench's Impact Award, celebrating "outstanding performance" and making a "huge impact toward achieving our mission".
Streamlined Plaid sign-up funnel, resulting in a 56% increase in new customers opting-in to real-time transactions.
Created a workflow management tool in under a month, enabling our operations department to transition to decentralized teams.
Built application making it easy to plan, manage, and execute a professional home cleaning list.
Created a communication training program for bookkeepers that outperformed learner-reported quality metrics by 24%.
Lived in and led outdoor mountain trekking, canoeing, and climbing programs for youth on five continents.
Launched a new survival school in Ras al Khaimah in collaboration with the government tourism authority.
Planned, bolted, and provided first-year instruction for at-height elements and overnight programs.
Managed a team of 20, overseeing complex logistics of 30 deep-wilderness programs covering over 100 weeks of outdoor tripping.
Involved in building a new adventure travel company during its first three years of operation. Learned a lot from the businesses failure.
Earned the Accredited Practitioner status and Professional in Outdoor Learning designation.
Awarded the Mountain Leader and Rock Climbing Instructor qualifications 10 years below the average award earner age.
Qualified as a teacher in the UK with a first-class PGDE.
